nodes.text: Xoddam Lothipp was an individual who served as the Deputy Director of the Graf Archive during its restoration effort. When a task force led by the archive droid TR-33NA, discovered a journal written by an unidentified artist, some of its contents were paired with data entries from the archive's scientific records. The restored journal was then released to the public with an introductory word from Lothipp.

Xoddam Lothipp was first mentioned in the canon reference book Star Wars: Alien Archive published in 2018, which was written by Natalie Clubb and Katrina Pallant. The book's in-universe introduction is attributed to Lothipp.
